messages.title: Building a Brighter Future for Epsom, Ewell, Ashtead, Nork and Tattenhams
messages.content: Ever since the 2016 referendum, Steve Gee has been fighting to reverse the decision and Stop Brexit.

messages.title: Together, we can Stop Brexit.
messages.content: Far too many people find that hard work no longer guarantees a happy, fulfilling and secure life for them and their children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve Gee has been fighting to reverse the decision and Stop Brexit. Only a Liberal Democrat majority government will MAKE IT STOP by revoking Article 50.
Let's get the Remain Bonus now and free up £50 billion to spend on key services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect the NHS and Revive High Streets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will protect the NHS, reverse schools cuts and revive tired high streets.

issues.brexitEurope: Steve Gee has been fighting to reverse the decision and Stop Brexit. Only a Liberal Democrat majority government will MAKE IT STOP by revoking Article 50.
issues.economy: Let's get the Remain Bonus now and free up £50 billion to spend on key services.
issues.education: The Lib Dems will... reverse schools cuts...
issues.health: The Lib Dems will protect the NHS...

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve cares passionately about his children's future. He says 'I want us to be an open and tolerant country, where we can work, travel and trade freely with our neighbours in Europe. This election is the most important in my lifetime. It is time to stand up and be counted, for Remainers to be as passionate as any Brexiteer.'

images.caption: Steve Gee with supporters, showcasing campaign signs for 'Liberal Democrats'.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Derek Harwood on behalf of Steve Gee (Liberal Democrats), both at 38 West Farm Close, Ashtead KT21 2LJ. Printed by Summit Print, Unit 21d, Holmethorpe Avenue, Redhill RH1 2NB.
